tool_description: Categorizes customer reviews into predefined business categories such as product quality, shipping, customer service, pricing, and user experience for targeted response handling.

product_category.description: Product category to provide context for categorization

business_type.description: Type of business: retail, service, restaurant, software, healthcare

multi_category.description: Whether to allow multiple category classifications for a single review

error_messages: Empty review text: Provide non-empty review_text parameter for categorization.
Invalid business type: Use one of [retail, service, restaurant, software, healthcare].
Review text too long: Review text must be under 5000 characters for processing.
usage: Provide review_text parameter with customer review content. Optionally specify product_category and business_type for more accurate categorization. Set multi_category to false if you need only the single most relevant category.

primary_category.description: Most relevant category for the review

all_categories.description: All applicable categories identified in the review

category_confidence.description: Confidence score for primary category assignment (0-1 scale)

subcategories.description: Specific subcategories within the primary category
